law.catch_line: School official or employee not to act as book agent.
law.text: No superintendent, teacher, or other official or employee of any institution supported wholly or in part by public funds shall act, directly or indirectly, as agent for any person whose school textbooks are filed with the chief state school officer.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 159, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 13.
